zh.ComprehensiveHome.index.926510-3: 不同的设备因为通信协议的不同，存在接入步骤的差异
zh.ComprehensiveHome.index.926510-5: 请根据业务需要对下述步骤进行选择性操作。
zh.ComprehensiveHome.index.926510-9: 产品是设备的集合，通常指一组具有相同功能的设备。物联设备必须通过产品进行接入方式配置。
zh.ComprehensiveHome.index.926510-11: 通过产品对同一类型的设备进行统一的接入方式配置。请参照设备铭牌说明选择匹配的接入方式。
zh.ComprehensiveHome.index.926510-13: 添加单个设备，用于验证产品模型是否配置正确。
zh.ComprehensiveHome.index.926510-15: 对添加的测试设备进行功能调试，验证能否连接到平台，设备功能是否配置正确。
zh.ComprehensiveHome.index.926510-17: 批量添加同一产品下的设备
zh.ComprehensiveHome.index.926510-22: 根据业务需求自定义开发对应的产品（设备模型）接入协议，并上传到平台。
zh.ComprehensiveHome.index.926510-24: 统一维护平台内的证书，用于数据通信加密。
zh.ComprehensiveHome.index.926510-26: 根据不同的传输类型配置平台底层网络组件相关参数。
zh.ComprehensiveHome.index.926510-28: 根据不同的传输类型，关联消息协议，配置设备接入网关相关参数。
zh.ComprehensiveHome.index.926510-30: 监控系统日志，及时处理系统异常。

en.ComprehensiveHome.index.926510-3: Different devices may have different access steps due to differences in communication protocols
en.ComprehensiveHome.index.926510-4: Recommended steps for operation and maintenance management
en.ComprehensiveHome.index.926510-5: Please perform selective operations on the following steps according to business needs.
en.ComprehensiveHome.index.926510-9: A product is a collection of devices, usually referring to a group of devices with the same functionality. IoT devices must be configured through product access methods.
en.ComprehensiveHome.index.926510-11: Configure unified access methods for devices of the same type through products. Please refer to the instructions on the device nameplate to select the matching access method.
en.ComprehensiveHome.index.926510-13: Add a single device to verify if the product model is configured correctly.
en.ComprehensiveHome.index.926510-15: Perform functional debugging on the added testing equipment to verify if it can connect to the platform and if the device's functions are configured correctly.
en.ComprehensiveHome.index.926510-17: Batch adding devices under the same product
en.ComprehensiveHome.index.926510-22: Customize and develop corresponding product (device model) access protocols according to business needs, and upload them to the platform.
en.ComprehensiveHome.index.926510-24: Unified maintenance of certificates within the platform for data communication encryption.
en.ComprehensiveHome.index.926510-26: Configure platform underlying network component related parameters based on different transmission types.
en.ComprehensiveHome.index.926510-28: According to different transmission types, associate message protocols, and configure device access gateway related parameters.
en.ComprehensiveHome.index.926510-30: Monitor system logs and promptly handle system exceptions.
